Question: Eastech Electronics (HK) Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Eastech Electronics (HK) Limited

Product: Smart Speakers with AURO-Scene Virtual Immersive Audio Technology

- Creates virtual spatial audio in up to 7.1.4 channels
- Reshapes sound perception in smart speaker environments
- Delivers extended bass response from any signal, including standard stereo music
- Supports soundbar speaker configurations from 2.0 to 5.1.2 and 3.1.1 smart speaker devices
- Integrates AURO-CX, a new scalable audio codec designed for streaming
- Decodes AURO-3D engine for scalable quality, channel count, sample rate, and objects
- Offers immersive audio experience through collaboration with NEWAURO
- Book a demo at CES 2024 to experience AURO-Scene on Eastech smart speakers
Summary_cn:
东方电子（香港）有限公司

产品：配备AURO-Scene虚拟沉浸音频技术的智能音箱

- 在最多7.1.4声道中创造虚拟空间音频
- 重塑智能音箱环境中的声音感知
- 提供从任意信号（包括标准立体声音乐）中的扩展低音响应
- 支持2.0到5.1.2和3.1.1智能音箱设备的立体声扬声器配置
- 集成AURO-CX，一种专为流媒体设计的新型可扩展音频编解码器
- 解码AURO-3D引擎以实现可扩展的音质、声道数、采样率和对象
- 通过与NEWAURO合作，提供沉浸式音频体验
- 在2024年的CES展会上预约进行AURO-Scene在东方智能音箱上的演示体验
